params._gameId: The ID of the game to which the scorecard belongs.

returns.weight: The attestation weight that was applied.

params._gameId: The ID of the game to get the voting period of.

returns._0: The voting period in number of blocks.

attestationStartTimeOf(uint256).details: This can be increassed to leave time for users to aquire attestation power, or delegate it, before a scorecard becomes live.

params._gameId: The ID of the game to get the attestation delay of.

params._calldata: The calldata that will be sent if the scorecard is ratified.
params._gameDelegate: The address where the game is being played.

params._attestationGracePeriod: The amount of time that must go by before a scorecard can be ratified.
params._attestationStartTime: The amount of time between a scorecard being submitted and attestations to it being enabled, measured in seconds.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._tierWeights: The weights of each tier in the approved scorecard.

returns.scorecardId: The scorecard ID that was ratified.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._gameId: The ID of the game to get a proposal state of.
params._scorecardId: The ID of the proposal to get the state of.

params._tierWeights: The weights of each tier in the scorecard.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

MAX_VOTING_POWER_TIER().notice: The max voting power each tier has if every token within the tier votes.

attestationGracePeriodOf(uint256).notice: The amount of time that must go by before a scorecard can be ratified.

attestationStartTimeOf(uint256).notice: The amount of time between a scorecard being submitted and attestations to it being enabled, measured in seconds.

controller().notice: The controller with which new projects should be deployed.

defaultAttestationDelegateProposalOf(uin.notice: The latest proposal submitted by the default voting delegate. _gameId The ID of the game of the default voting delegate proposal.

hashScorecardOf(address,bytes).notice: A value representing the contents of a scorecard.

quorum(uint256).notice: The number of voting units that must have participated in a proposal for it to be ratified.

ratifiedScorecardIdOf(uint256).notice: The scorecard that has been ratified. _gameId The ID of the game of the ratified scorecard.

ratifyScorecardFrom(uint256,(uint256,uin.notice: Ratifies a scorecard that has been approved.

submitScorecardFor(uint256,(uint256,uint.notice: Submits a scorecard to be attested to.

documentation.text: @notice The duration of one block.

@notice The time the vote will be active for once it has started, measured in seconds.
 _gameId The ID of the game for which the voting period applies.
@notice The max voting power each tier has if every token within the tier votes.
@notice The controller with which new projects should be deployed.

@notice The latest proposal submitted by the default voting delegate.
 _gameId The ID of the game of the default voting delegate proposal.

@notice The scorecard that has been ratified.
 _gameId The ID of the game of the ratified scorecard.
